label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Game now starts at night time and turns to day once creeps spawn

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutral creeps no longer increase their bounty over the course of the game

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutral stacked gold bonus reduced from 40% to 30%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshanarmor growth increased from 0.325 to 0.375

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Radiant Ancient camp is now easier to stack

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added lore to all items

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Rearranged some items in the shop (mostly ordering based on cost changes in recent years, but also in some cases moving from one category to another. Consumables are unchanged.)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • When combining, items will attempt to be placed into the slot of their component that has the most similar active effect. For example, Magic Wand will combine onto Magic Stick, Bloodthorn will combine onto Orchid Malevolence, etc.

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutral ancients magic resistance reduced from 70% to 50%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Thunderhide's Frenzy ability no longer interrupts movement when cast by a neutral

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Thunderhide's Slam ability no longer interrupts movement when cast by a neutral

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Thunderhide's Slam damage increased from 70 to 250

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Thunderhide's Slam slow increased from 25% to 60%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Thunderhide's Slam radius increased from 250 to 350

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Thunderhide's Accuracy Aura ability has now been moved to Ancient Rumblehide

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fixed Thunderhide Accuracy Aura not working properly

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Granite Golemmodel size increased

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Black DragonFireball cooldown increased from 10 to 15

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Alpha Wolfunit level increased from 4 to 5

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • GhostBase attack time increased from 1 to 1.2

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new item:Aghanim’s Shard

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Costs 1400 Gold. All heroes have their own custom shard upgrade as part of this update which permanently adds a new ability or improves an existing one. Can be purchased starting at 20 minutes and gets consumed immediately when it's given to your hero (like Aghanim's Blessing).

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • You can now check what Scepter and Shard upgrades do for the selected hero directly in the Hero UI, next to their abilities, as well as which ones are active. Consumed Scepter buffs no longer shows up as a buff icon mixed in with other buffs. Alt-Clicking on the Scepter and Shard UI will notify your allies whether the selected hero owns that upgrade.

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml:
• Aphotic Shieldcast point reduced from 0.4 to 0.3
  • Borrowed Timescepter duration increased from 5/6/7 to 6/7/8
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +48 Mist Coil Heal/Damage to +50
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +6 Armor to +65 Damage
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +80 Damage to +8 Armor
  • Level 25 Talent increased from 375 AoE Mist Coil to 425
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesMist Coiland Aphotic Shield
      • Apply aCurse of Avernusstack on enemies.
      • Increases Curse of Avernus base slow by 6%.

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Unstable Concoctionmanacost reduced from 120 to 90/100/110/120
  • Unstable Concoction cooldown reduced from 22/20/18/16 to 16
  • Acid Spraydamage increased from 15/20/25/30 to 20/25/30/35
  • Acid Spray first damage instance is now immediate rather than after a second
  • Gold bonus cap reduced from 18/22/26/30 to 18/21/24/27 (last hit count from 5/7/8/9 to 5/6/7/8)
  • If an ally already has a scepter buff or the item, it refunds them based on which version they have (either 4200 or 5800).
  • Alchemist granted scepter buffs provide the full stat bonuses.
  • Scepter damage/spell amp bonus reduced from 30/6 to 20/5
  • Level 20 Talent reduced from +30% Cleave to +25%
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsBerserk Potion
      • Throws a potion at the target ally, applying a basic dispel and granting +50 Attack Speed and +40 HP Regen for 10 seconds.
      • Cast Range: 800. Cooldown: 45. Manacost: 125. Can be used on self.

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Blastmax travel time improved from 2 seconds to 1.75
  • Chilling Touchmanacost reduced from 30/50/70/90 to 30/45/60/75
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesIce Vortex
      • Deal 40 DPS and reduces attack speed by 20

label: Anti-Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Mana Breakmax burn reduced from 1/2/3/4% to 1/1.8/2.6/3.4%
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +12 Agility to +8 Armor
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from +325 Blink Cast Range to +300
  • Level 20 Talent changed from Blink Uncontrollable Illusion to +0.1 Mana Void Damage Multiplier
  • Scepter Rework
    • GrantsBlink Fragment
      • Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attacks them for 7 seconds. Uses Blink's Cast Range. Illusion cannot be controlled, deals 50% damage, takes 250%.
      • CastingCounterspellalso casts it on the Fragment illusion. Cooldown: 20. Manacost: 50
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Counterspell
      • Successful Counterspell creates an illusion attacking the caster for 5 seconds.
      • Removes Counterspell manacost.

label: Arc Warden
descriptionHtml:
• Strength gain reduced from 3.0 to 2.8
  • Level 10 Talent reduced from +300 Flux Cast Range to +250
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from +15% Cooldown Reduction to +12%
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from 50 Attack Speed to 40
  • Level 20 Talent changed from -1.5s Spark Wraith Cooldown Reduction to +150 Spark Wraith Damage
  • Level 25 Talent changed from +250 Spark Wraith Damage to +12s Tempest Double Duration
  • Scepter Rework
    • After impacting an enemy, Spark Wraiths now spawn a new Wraith, which then starts its activation period.
    • Has a 3 second spawn delay. Duplicated Wraiths do not duplicate again
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesMagnetic Field
      • Now pushes enemies out of the area at cast time, and provides allies in it with +20% Magic Resistance.

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Battle Hungercast range rescaled from 750 to 700/775/850/925
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +20 Movement Speed to +1.75 Mana Regen
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +2 Mana Regen to +25 Movement Speed
  • Level 15 Talent changed from Attacking Procs Counter Helix to +300 Health
  • Scepter Rework
    • Berserker's Callapplies Battle Hunger to affected units. Lowers Berserker's Call cooldown by 2 seconds.
    • Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants you 7 per affected target (half on creeps).
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Causes your attacks to have a chance to proc aCounter Helix.
    • Attack procs ignore Counter Helix cooldown. Provides +20 Attack Speed.

label: Bane
descriptionHtml:
• Night vision improved from 800 to 1200
  • Brain Sapdamage type changed from Magical to Pure
  • Brain Sap damage reduced from 100/200/300/400 to 75/150/225/300
  • Brain Sap scepter no longer improves the cast point.
  • Brain Sap cast point reduced from 0.4 to 0.2
  • Fiend’s Gripdamage type changed from Magical to Pure
  • Fiend’s Grip damage reduced from 100/155/215 to 80/120/160
  • Swapped the Nightmare and Enfeeble hotkeys
  • ReworkedEnfeeble
    • Reduces all attack damage by 25/35/45/55%, regeneration by 25/35/45/55% and cast speed by 30%.
    • Lasts 8 seconds. Does not pierce Spell Immunity.
    • Cooldown: 20/16/12/8. Cast Range: 1100. Manacost: 40/50/60/70. Cast Point: 0.2
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +9% Spell Amp to +12%
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from +125 Cast Range to +100
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from +200 Brain Sap Damage/Heal to +150
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Fiend’s Grip
      • Fiend’s Grip now creates an uncontrollable illusion that is also channeling Fiend’s Grip on the target.
      • Illusion takes 750% incoming damage and immediately dies if it is interrupted.
      • Multiple Fiend’s Grip effects do not stack on the target.

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor increased by 1
  • Sticky Napalmno longer does less damage to creeps
  • Sticky Napalm damage per stack reduced from 10/15/20/25 to 6/12/18/24
  • Sticky Napalm turn rate slow reduced from 40/50/60/70% to 10/30/50/70%
  • Sticky Napalm radius increased from 375 to 375/400/425/450
  • Fireflymovement speed decreased from 4/7/10/13% to 3/6/9/12%
  • Flaming Lassocooldown increased from 100/90/80 to 120/115/110
  • Flaming Lasso cast range increased from 100 to 175
  • Flaming Lasso scepter secondary range increased from 550 to 600
  • Level 20 Talent increased from +25 Movement Speed to +30
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +12% Cooldown Reduction to 2 Flamebreak Charges
  • Level 25 Talent changed from -10s Flamebreak Cooldown to -35s Flaming Lasso Cooldown
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Flaming Lasso
      • Allows Flaming Lasso to be cast on an allied hero, granting them 80% damage reduction.
      • Has 20 second cooldown when used on allies.

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Wild Axesdamage per axe increased from 30/60/90/120 to 40/70/100/130
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +200 Hawk Vision to +3 Mana Regen
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +450 Health to +50 Wild Axes Damage
  • Level 25 Talent changed from +100 Wild Axes Damage to +350 Health Beastmaster Controlled Units (affects Beastmaster and all of his summoned units)
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesCall of the Wild Hawk
      • Hawks become controllable and gain Dive Bomb.
      • Channels for 1 second, revealing itself, and then flies towards the target enemy, dealing 175 damage and stunning them for 1 second, killing the hawk.
    • Cast Range: 500.

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Base intelligence reduced from 21 to 17
  • Bloodragehp cost reduced from 2.2/2.3/2.4/2.5 to 2%
  • Bloodrage attack speed increased from 50/80/110/140 to 60/90/120/150
  • Blood Ritedamage reduced from 120/180/240/300 to 120/160/200/240
  • Blood Rite cooldown increased from 12 to 15/14/13/12
  • Blood Rite manacost increased from 70/80/90/100 to 90/100/110/120
  • Thirstnon-hero heal increased from 8/12/16/20% to 11/14/17/20%
  • Thirst no longer provides half heal when within 300 range of dying creeps
  • Thirst now provides full heal (rather than half) when within 300 range of dying heroes
  • Thirst hero heal reduced from 12/18/24/30% to 10/15/20/25%
  • Rupturemanacost reduced from 200/225/250 to 100/150/200
  • Rupture damage increased from 30/45/60% to 36/48/60%
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from -5s Blood Rite Cooldown to -4
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Bloodrage
      • Bloodrage attacks now deal 1.5% of the target’s max health as pure damage and heals you for that amount.
      • Only affects Bloodseeker.

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed increased from 315 to 320
  • Intelligence rescaled from 19 + 2 to 22 + 1.9
  • Shadow Walk slow increased from 14/20/26/32% to 16/24/32/40%
  • Track speed radius increased from 900 to 1200
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Track
      • Allies now gain 50% of Track speed boost.
      • Provides 800 vision around the Track target for your team.

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Base agility reduced from 22 to 19
  • Drunken Brawlernow passively provides 6/12/18/24% Evasion and 24% Critical Strike chance for 145/160/175/190% damage
  • Drunken Brawler can now be activated to provide 3x chance for evasion and critical strike and alternate between 20% slower and 40% faster for 5 seconds.
  • Drunken Brawler cooldown increased from 23/21/19/17 to 29/25/21/17
  • Primal SplitEarth brewling armor increased from 3 to 3/5/7
  • Primal Split Earth brewling health rescaled from 1500/2200/3000 to 1400/2200/3000
  • Primal Split Earth Brewling hp regen increased from 1/2/2 to 2/4/6
  • Primal Split Storm hp regen increased from 1/2/2 to 2/4/6
  • Primal Split Storm magic resistance increased from 0 to 25%
  • Primal Split Storm health reduced from 1000/1500/1900 to 1000/1400/1800
  • Primal Split Fire Brewling armor increased from 0/3/6 to 0/4/8
  • Primal Split Fire Brewling hp regen increased from 2/4/4 to 2/4/6
  • Primal Split Fire Brewling now has 30% Status Resistance
  • Scepter Rework
    • Primal Split now has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time.
    • Your hero forms back on whichever brewling you canceled it from.
    • Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown.
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +175 Health to +1sThunder ClapSlow
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +2.5s Thunder Clap Slow to +30%Cinder BrewDamage/Duration
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +15% Magic Resistance to +350 Health
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from +120% Drunken Brawler Critical Strike Damage to +80%
  • Level 25 Talent changed from -65s Primal Split Cooldown to Brewlings Gain Drunken Brawler Passive
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Primal Split
      • Primal Split now creates a Void brewling.
      • Has Astral Pulse ability, affecting enemies in 500 AoE.
      • Applies a 20/30/40% slow and Disarm for 2.5 seconds. Cooldown: 20.

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml:
• Warpathbonus damage increased from 22/28/34 to 25/30/35
  • Viscous Nasal GooScepter now also increases max stacks from 4 to 8
  • Viscous Nasal Goo scepter radius increased from 825 to 950
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +5 Max Goo Stacks to +15 Attack Speed
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsHairball
      • Coughs a quill filled hairball towards the target location.
      • Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in a 700 radius with Goo and two Quills.
      • Cast Range: 1500. Cooldown: 20. Manacost: 100.

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml:
• Agility gain reduced from 3.2 to 3.0
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsSilken Bola
      • Consumes 1 Spin Web charge and roots the target enemy for 2 seconds.
      • Cast Range: 900. Cooldown: 12. Manacost: 50.

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml:
• Stampededuration rescaled from 4 to 3.5/4/4.5
  • Stampede damage increased from 100/200/300% of your Strength to 200/250/300%
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +40 Damage to +1s Stampede Duration
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesDouble Edge
      • Causes Double Edge to increase your strength by 15% per hero hit for 12 seconds.
      • Duration refreshes per stack, up to 5 stacks.
      • Slows enemies by 15% for 2 seconds.

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesChaos Bolt
      • Chaos Bolt creates aPhantasmillusion attacking the target for the duration of the stun.
      • Increases cast range by 300.

label: Chen
descriptionHtml:
• Divine Favorno longer has an active component
  • Holy Persuasioncan now be cast on an already converted unit to teleport it to you or can be cast on your own hero to teleport all creeps to you
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +150 Health to +175
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +150 Cast Range to +175
  • Level 15 Talent changed from -32s Divine Favor Cooldown to +12% Penitence Slow
  • Level 25 Talent changed from +4 Holy Persuasion Max Units to +3 Holy Persuasion Max Units and 3 Charges
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Divine Favor
      • Allows Divine Favor to be cast on allies, teleporting them back home after 6 seconds.
      • Cooldown: 35. Manacost: 200. Cast Range: 500.
      • Purgeable. Cannot target Spell Immune Allies.

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml:
• Base mana regen reduced from 0.25 to 0
  • Level 10 Talent changed fromSkeleton WalkExit Summons A Burning Army Skeleton to +8 Agility
  • Level 20 Talent changed from Kills ResetDeath PactCooldown to -10s Strafe Cooldown
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Skeleton Walk
      • Causes Skeleton Walk to create two Burning Army Skeletons on Exit.

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml:
• Level 25 Talent changed from +40% Magic Resistance to Spell Immunity While InsidePower Cogs
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsJetpack
      • Rises up and grants flying vision, flying movement and 15% movement speed, but significantly reduced ability to turn.
      • Lasts 6 seconds. You are disarmed during the flight. Casting Hookshot ends this buff.
      • Cooldown: 25. Manacost: 150.

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml:
• Frostbitedamage interval changed from 0.7 to 0.25 (same overall damage, first instance at 0.25)
  • Frostbite DPS changed to a fixed 25 per tick, rather than being defined by its total damage (same overall damage to both heroes and creeps normally, but affects things that change spell duration like her talent and status resistance)
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Frostbite
      • Reduces Frostbite cooldown by 1 second and allows it to be cast on yourself, reducing incoming damage by 70% for the duration.
      • Allows casting Frostbite while channeling as long as a valid target is in range.

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Ion Shellradius increased from 250 to 275
  • Level 15 Talent changed from Ion Shell Provides 350 Max Health to +6 Armor
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +8 Armor to +1sWall of Replicaslow
  • Scepter Rework
    • Upgrades Ion Shell
      • Causes Ion Shell to have 2 Charges, increases duration by 20 seconds and provides +350 Health.
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsNormal Punch
      • Passive cooldown attack. Causes your next attack on a hero to knock an illusion out of them and stun them for up to 2 seconds, knock back for 350 distance and deal 250 damage based on how far you've moved in the past 3 seconds.
      • Cooldown: 14. Max power is after 1500 distance moved. Illusions lasts for 5 seconds.

label: Dark Willow
descriptionHtml:
• Base intelligence increased by 3
  • Cursed Crowncast range increased from 600 to 600/625/650/675
  • Bramble Mazecast range increased from 1200 to 1100/1200/1300/1400
  • Terrorizecast range reduced from 1500 to 1300
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +0.4s Cursed Crown Stun Duration to +0.6s
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +100 Cast Range to -2sShadow RealmCooldown
  • Level 15 Talent changed from -2s Shadow Realm Cooldown to +125 Cast Range
  • Level 20 Talent reduced from -10s Bramble Maze CD to -8
  • Level 25 Talent increased from +1.3s Terrorize Duration to +1.5s
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Cursed Crown
      • Cursed Crown now creates four brambles around the target after the counter ends (regardless of how it ends).
      • Reduces cooldown by 3 seconds.

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml:
• Shallow Graveduration rescaled from 5 to 4/4.5/5/5.5
  • Shallow Grave cooldown reduced from 60/46/32/18 to 42/34/26/18
  • Shallow Grave cast range increased from 550/700/850/1000 to 700/800/900/1000
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +30Shadow WaveHeal/Damage to +35 Attack Speed
  • Scepter Rework
    • Causes Shadow Wave to dispel allies, increases heal by +60 and increases damage by +80.
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Launches an attack at the three closest enemies within 1200 range (prioritizes heroes) each time you cast an ability.

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed increased from 310 to 335
  • Spirit Siphonno longer drains movement speed
  • Spirit Siphon charge replenish time from 45/40/35/30 to 36/34/32/30
  • Exorcismghost speed increased from 500 to 525
  • Turn rate improved from 0.5 to 0.8
  • Level 25 Talent changed from Exorcism Grants Haste to -20s Spirit Siphon Replenish Time
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Spirit Siphon
      • Spirit Siphon now drains 0.75 armor per second and gives it to you.
      • Armor gain/loss lasts for 14 seconds (starts from cast time).

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml:
• Level 10 Talent increased from -2s Kinetic Field Cooldown to -3s
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesThunder Strike
      • Allows Thunder Strike to be cast on allies, follows the ally and deals damage around them.
      • Each strike gives a short 1s buff that provides +50% MS and +75 Attack Speed (strike interval is every 2 seconds).
      • Increases radius by 160 when used on allies.

label: Doom
descriptionHtml:
• Scepter Rework
    • CausesDoomto apply Break and reduces cooldown from 145 to 100.
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +2s Doom Duration to +3s
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesInfernal Blade
      • Infernal Blade stun duration is increased from 0.6 to 1.2 second.
      • If the enemy level is a multiple of 3 or above level 24, they will be stunned for an additional 0.6 seconds and take 150 bonus damage.

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Breathe Firemanacost reduced from 100/110/120/130 to 90/100/110/120
  • Dragon Taildamage increased from 25/50/75/100 to 50/75/100/125
  • Elder Dragon Formsplash radius increased from 300 to 350
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +350 Health to +400
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Grants Elder Dragon Form theFireballability.
      • Ignites a 450 AoE area for 10 seconds, dealing 80 damage per second to enemies in it.
      • Lasts 10 seconds. Cast Range: 1400. Cooldown: 20. Manacost: 150.

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage reduced by 2
  • Frost Arrowsslow reduced from 16/32/48/64 to 15/30/45/60
  • Marksmanshipagility bonus rescaled from 28/36/44% to 25/35/45%
  • Marksmanship damage bonus reduced from 70/80/90 to 50/70/90
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +2.5s Gust Silence Duration to -4s Gust Cooldown
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Frost Arrows
      • Frost Arrows apply a Hypothermia stack to enemy heroes, reducing their regeneration by 10% per stack.
      • Lasts 7 seconds. If an enemy hero dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal 60 magic damage per stack and 25% slow for 2 seconds to enemies within 650 radius. Max Stacks: 7

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Earth Remnant duration reduced from 2 minutes to 1 minute
  • Enchant Remnantcan now also be cast on Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used this way.
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesStone Remnant
      • Causes Earth Remnants to provide 400 ground vision. Increases charge count by 4. (Can use alt to see the radius)

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesFissure
      • Reduces Fissure cooldown by 2 seconds and allows you to walk on it.
      • Whenever you cast a spell, an aftershock effect is replicated throughout the fissure path

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesEcho Stomp
      • Allows you to turn Echo Stomp on autocast.
      • When cast while on Autocast, you will take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Intelligence gain increased from 1.8 to 2.2
  • Activate Fire Remnantscepter manacost increased from 25 to 75
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesFire Remnant
      • Fire Remnants deal 45 damage per second in a 600 AoE around them.
      • Dying or killing an enemy hero leaves a Fire Remnant nearby.
      • Kills within 400 range of you count.
      • DPS from multiple Fire Remnants does not stack.

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml:
• Enchantcooldown rescaled from 20 to 28/24/20/16
  • Sproinkupgrade no longer grants +150 attack range passively
  • Sproink now launches an Impetus attack on the 3 furthest enemy units within your attack range +200.
  • Sproink cooldown increased from 3 to 5 seconds
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesNature's Attendants
      • Adds 3 permanent Nature’s Attendants that follow you around.

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml:
• Demonic Conversionattack point improved from 0.4 to 0.3
  • Demonic Conversion duration from 35 to 40
  • Maleficecooldown reduced from 18/17/16/15 to 14
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +4sMidnight PulseDuration to +0.35s Malefice Stun Duration
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from 12% Cooldown Reduction to 10%
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +0.35s Malefice Stun Duration to +150 Midnight Pulse Radius
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesBlack Hole
      • Black Hole now does a non-interrupting pull towards its center in a 1200 AoE (pulls at a rate of 175 units per second)

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Base agility reduced by 4 (base damage unchanged)
  • Time Lockbonus damage reduced from 20/25/30/35 to 10/15/20/25
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from +275Time WalkCast Range to +250
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Time Walk
      • Time Walk remains castable for 1.5 second after landing.
      • If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location.
      • Increases Time Walk cast range by 200. (Note: Does not change health the second use)

label: Grimstroke
descriptionHtml:
• Base attack range increased from 575 to 600
  • Ink SwellMax damage is reduced from 100/200/300/400 to 90/180/270/360
  • Ink Swell max values now happen after 2.5 seconds of touching an enemy, rather than 3 seconds
  • Phantom's Embracemanacost reduced from 110/120/130/140 to 80/100/120/140
  • Phantom's Embrace cooldown rescaled from to 32/28/24/20 to 36/30/24/18
  • Phantom's Embrace bounty from 37/20 Gold/XP to 10/10
  • Dark Portraitillusion duration increased from 15 seconds to 25
  • Phantom;s Embrace now refreshes the cooldown if the target it was cast on dies before it reaches them
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +80 Ink Swell Damage to -4s Ink Swell Cooldown
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsInk Over
      • Covers a target enemy in ink for 6 seconds, slowing attack speed by 50, movement speed by 20% and dealing a total of 240 damage over its duration.
      • Cast Range: 700. Cooldown: 14. Manacost: 125

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml:
• Attack backswing animation reduced from 0.65 to 0.1
  • Base damage range rescaled from 40-50 to 42-48
  • Base agility increased by 7 (base damage unchanged)
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesRocket Barrage
      • Rocket Barrage now hits an extra target.
      • Increases Barrage duration by 1 second.

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Berserker's Bloodmax attack speed increased from 130/190/250/310 to 160/210/260/310
  • Life Breakscepter duration increased from 2.5 to 3
  • Life Break scepter now also increases cast range by +300
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +325 Life Break Cast Range to -3s Life Break Cooldown
  • Level 25 Talent increased from +175 Attack Range to +200

    • GrantsSleeping Dart
      • Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep for 3 seconds (target is invulnerable until duration ends).
      • When the target wakes up, they receive 150 damage and are slowed by 25% for 4 seconds. Cooldown: 20. Cast Range: 1200. Manacost: 125

label: Rubick
descriptionHtml:
• Arcane Supremacyno longer provides debuff amplification
  • Arcane Supremacy now provides +75/125/175/225 Cast Range
  • Spell Stealnow provides bonus +10/20/30% Debuff Amplification to the stolen spells
  • Spell Steal cooldown rescaled from 20/18/16 to 26/20/14

  • Level 15 Talent changed from Fade Bolt Steals Hero Damage to +100 Base Damage
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesTelekinesis
      • Allows you to use Telekinesis on yourself or an ally.
      • Throw range is 60% longer and cooldown is reduced by 30% when targeting allies.
      • Throw delay is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml:
• Epicenternow uses cast time instead of channel time
  • Epicenter radius increase from 275->725 to 500->725
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +8%Caustic FinaleSlow to +15%
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Epicenter
      • EpicenterEvery 700 units moved causes an Epicenter Pulse around you in 400 AoE.

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml:
• Shadow Poisonis no longer dispellable
  • Demonic PurgeScepter upgrade debuff now ends when a new one is cast (deals damage relative to how long it lasted)
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Demonic Purge
      • Allows Demonic Purge to be cast on allies, continuously dispelling them and healing them at the end instead of damaging them.
      • Does not slow allies.

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml:
• Shadowrazemanacost reduced from 90 to 75/80/85/90
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +15 Attack Speed to +20
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesNecromastery
      • Necromastery now provides 0.75% Spell Amp per Soul

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Mass Serpent Warddamage increased from 50/80/110 to 50/85/120
  • Level 15 Talent increased from -4.5s Hex Cooldown to -5
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from +30 Wards Attack Damage to +25
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesShackles
      • Shackles creates 4 Serpent Wards that attack the target while you channel.
      • Increases Shackle range by 150. Wards last 8 seconds.

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml:
• Last WordScepter radius increased from 600 to 650
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesGlaives of Wisdom
      • Causes Glaives to bounce once towards the closest enemy unit, dealing 50% of your attack damage.
      • Bounce range is 600 unit to unit.

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesAncient Seal
      • Ancient Seal debuff now causes other debuffs applied to last 40% longer
      • Grants vision over the target.

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml:
• Guardian Sprintmovement speed reduced from 18/26/34/42% to 16/24/32/40%
  • Guardian Sprint river speed rescaled from 7/19/31/43 to 10/20/30/40%
  • Slithereen Crushmanacost increased from 80/95/105/115 to 90/100/110/120
  • Scepter hp regen reduced from 35 to 30
  • Scepter armor bonus reduced from 12 to 10
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesCorrosive Haze
      • Causes Corrosive Haze to be applied for 5 seconds to units hit with Slithereen Crush.

label: Slark
descriptionHtml:
• Shadow Dancecooldown reduced from 80/70/60 to 80/65/50
  • Pouncescepter range increased from 1100 to 1200
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +6 Agility to +7
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsFish Bait
      • Can throw it on enemies to reduce their movement speed by 30% and grant you truesight over them for 4 seconds.
      • If you pounce an enemy during that time, you will be rewarded with 50 attack speed for the duration of Pounce.
      • Cast range: 1100. Manacost: 100. Cooldown: 20.

label: Snapfire
descriptionHtml:
• Firesnap Cookiemanacost increased from 100 to 110
  • Lil' Shreddermanacost reduced from 90 to 75/80/85/90
  • Gobble Upnow has a 150 Manacost
  • Gobble Up'sSpit Outno longer has a 150 manacost
  • Gobble Up can now target special units like Golems, Spirit Bear, etc
  • Gobble Up impact damage changed from 400 to match the current Glob values on your ultimate (160/240/320)
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesScatterblast
      • Units in the point blank range of Scatterblast will be knocked back 250 units, take 125 extra damage and be stunned for 1.5 seconds.

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml:
• Strength gain increased from 1.7 to 2.0
  • Agility gain reduced from 3.4 to 3.2
  • Base agility increased from 21 to 27 (base damage unchanged)
  • Shrapnelcharge replenish time reduced from 40 to 35 seconds
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsConcussive Grenade
      • Knocks enemies back 425 units, slowing them by 50% and disarming them for 3 seconds.
      • Radius: 375. Cast Range: 550. Cooldown: 20. Manacost: 75

label: Spectre
descriptionHtml:
• Base attack speed reduced from 100 to 90
  • Dispersionrescaled from 7/12/17/22% to 8/12/16/20%
  • Spectral Daggercooldown increased from 16 to 22/20/18/16
  • Spectral Dagger manacost increased from 100/120/140/160 to 130/140/150/160
  • Shadow Stepscepter ability now also casts a Spectral Dagger on its target
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Dispersion
      • Can activate Dispersion to spawn a Haunt Illusion to attack the most recent hero that damaged you in the last 5 seconds.
      • Illusion lasts 5 seconds. Cooldown: 25. Manacost: 150

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml:
• Nether Strikecooldown reduced from 100/80/60 to 90/70/50
  • Charge of Darknessscepter cooldown increased from 6 to 7
  • Charge of Darkness scepter movement bonus increased from +100 to +175
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Nether Strike
      • Causes Nether Strike to have a cast delay rather than a cast time, deal 200 extra damage and apply Break for 4 seconds.
      • You are Spell Immune during the cast delay.

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Level 15 Talent increased from +325 Health to +375
  • Level 25 Talent changed fromOverloadPierces Immunity to +2 Overload Bounce (Causes your attack to bounce up to 2 times at random enemies, can bounce back if there are only 2 enemies)
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsElectric Rave
      • Gives you and allied heroes within 750 AoE of you 3 Overload charges.
      • Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.
      • Cooldown: 30. Manacost: 150.
      • Passively provides 40 Attack Speed to Storm Spirit.

label: Sven
descriptionHtml:
• God's Strengthreduced from 110/160/210% to 100/150/180%
  • Storm Hammerscepter no longer applies attacks on impact
  • Storm Hammer scepter bonus range reduced from +500 to +350
  • Level 15 Talent changed from Storm Hammer Dispels Enemies to +4sWarcryDuration
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Storm Hammer
      • Storm Hammer now applies a dispel on enemies.

label: Techies
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesBlast Off!
      • Increases Blast Off! cast range by 600 and applies a 1.5 second stun to enemies within 200 AoE (half the primary radius).

label: Templar Assassin
descriptionHtml:

  • Base attack range increased from 140 to 160
  • Psi Bladesattack range bonus rescaled from 60/120/180/240 to 80/130/180/230

  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesPsionic Trap
      • Causes Psionic Trap to silence enemies for up to 2.5 seconds based on how long the trap has been charged. Minimum 0.5 duration.

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Reflectionduration increased from 2.5/3.5/4.5/5.5 to 3.25/4/4.75/5.5
  • Terror Waveability is now gained when equipping Scepter, rather than afterMetamorphosiscast
  • Terror Wave fear duration reduced from 3.75 to 2.5
  • Terror Wave fear now sends units away from you rather than towards the fountain
  • Terror Wave scepter ability now grants you Metamorphosis for 10 seconds. If Metamorphosis is already active, it extends it by 10 seconds instead.
  • Level 25 Talent increased from -32sSunderCooldown to -34
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsDemon Zeal
      • Costs 25% of your Current HP to cast, providing you +25% Movement and +50 Attack Speed for 6 seconds.
      • Provides 50% more bonus while melee. Cooldown: 14.

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml:
• Kraken Shelldamage block increased from 14/26/38/50 to 18/30/42/54
  • Level 10 Talent increased from +15 Movement Speed to +20
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +80GushDamage to +1.75 Mana Regen
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +3 Mana regen to +120 Gush Damage
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesAnchor Smash
      • Increases Anchor Smash damage by +90 and causes it to affect buildings.
      • Reduces cooldown by 1 second.

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml:

  • Whirling Deathbase damage from 90/120/150/180 to 80/120/160/200

  • Timber Chainspeed increased from 1600/2000/2400/2800 to 1900/2200/2500/2800
  • Chakramscepter slow now stacks independently from the primary Chakram
  • Chakram cast animation reduced from 0.3 to 0.15 (affects his scepter as well)
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsFlamethrower
      • Releases a flame in the direction you are facing. Lasts 7 seconds.
      • Applies a debuff that deals 75 DPS and slows by 20% for 3 seconds.
      • Sets trees on fire that eventually die after 5 seconds. Cooldown: 15. Manacost: 100.

label: Tinker
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Aghanim's Scepter
    • Upgrades your laser into a Shrink Ray, causing it to have +400 cast range and reduces the enemy model size and current health values by 20% (stacks).
    • Laser bounces once on the furthest target up to 700 range from the primary target (prioritizes heroes).
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsDefense Matrix
      • Targets an allied unit, applying a barrier to them that blocks the next 200 damage and provides 40% status resistance.
      • Barrier lasts up to 10 seconds or until the damage shield is consumed.
      • Cast Range: 400. Cooldown: 30. Manacost: 100.

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml:
• Tree Grabcooldown reduced from 25/20/15/10 to 16/14/12/10
  • Avalanchenow deals 2.5x damage to tossed units, rather than 3x
  • Growdamage increased from 25/50/75 to 30/70/110
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +3 Tree Grab Attack Charges to +5
  • Level 25 Talent increased from -7s Avalanche Cooldown to -8s
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsCraggy Exterior
      • Provides a 20% chance to stun the enemy for 1 second and deal 100 damage when a physical attack impacts your hero.
      • Works against enemies within 400 range. Procs after an attack impacts, and does not affect Spell Immune enemies.

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml:
• Overgrowthnow interrupts targets again
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesNature's Guise
      • Causes Nature's Guise to root enemies upon attacking. Roots them for 1 second and deals a total of 200 damage.
      • Lasts an extra second when attacking near a tree. Cooldown: 10

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml:
• Berserker's Ragemovement bonus increased from 10/20/30/40 to 15/25/35/45
  • Level 25 Talent changed from -5s Whirling Axes Cooldown to +2sBattle TranceDuration
  • Reworked Aghanim's Scepter
    • Causes Ranged Axes to dispel enemies, and melee axes to dispel yourself.
    • Reduces cooldown from 9 to 4 and manacost by half.
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Battle Trance
      • Casting Battle Trance now gives you a global aura that gives allied heroes (including yourself) +60 Attack Speed.

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• Walrus Kicknow targets a direction, and kicks the closest enemy unit to you within 250 radius. Prioritizes heroes.
  • Level 25 Talent increased from -8sSnowballCooldown to -10s
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsFrozen Sigil
      • Summons a flying Sigil that slows enemy attack by -30 and movement speed by -20% for enemies within 650 radius.
      • Lasts 25 seconds. Cooldown: 30. Manacost: 100.

label: Underlord
descriptionHtml:

  • Reworked Aghanim's Scepter
    • Dark Riftcan now be cast on allied heroes.
    • Reduces cast delay by 1 second and cooldown by 50 seconds.
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Firestorm
      • Firestorm can be self targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows you around.
      • Also causes Firestorm to heal you for 15% of the damage values. Reduces cast point by half.

label: Undying
descriptionHtml:
• Decaymanacost increased from 70/85/100/115 to 85/95/105/115
  • Soul RipDamage/Heal per unit reduced from 22/29/36/43 to 19/26/33/40
  • Level 10 Talent changed from +5 Health Regen to +40 Decay Duration
  • Level 15 Talent changed from +40s Decay Duration to +10 Soul Rip Damage/Heal
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +4sTombstoneAttacks to Destroy to -1.5s Decay Cooldown
  • Level 25 Talent changed from -2s Decay Cooldown to +6 Tombstone Attacks to Destroy
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Decay
      • Increases Decay radius by 100 and spawns a zombie around each hero target.

label: Ursa

  • Earthshockslow increased from 10/20/30/40% to 16/24/32/40%
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +300 Health to +350
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesFury Swipes

label: Vengeful Spirit

• Base intelligence increased from 17 to 19
  • Magic Missilecast range increased from 550 to 575/600/625/650
  • Magic Missile projectile speed increased from 900 to 1350
  • Vengeance Aurano longer increases attack range or primary attribute
  • Vengeance Aura no longer has a illusion/death mechanics
  • Vengeance Aura now increases base attack damage by 8/16/24/32%
  • Reworked Aghanim's Scepter
    • Upon death, creates a strong-illusion of you that can cast all your spells and deals 100% damage and takes 100% damage.
    • Illusion has 30% movement speed bonus. If the illusion is alive when you respawn, you will take its place.
    • XP earned by your illusion is given to your hero.
  • Nether Swapno longer has charges
  • Nether Swap cooldown reduced from 90/80/70 to 60/45/30
  • Nether Swap cast range increased from 700/850/1000 to 800/950/1100
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +100 Vengeance Aura Attack Range to +125 Cast Range
  • Level 25 Talent changed from Vengeance Aura Illusion Casts Spells to +16% Vengeance Aura Base Damage
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesWave of Terror
      • Wave of Terror now steals 25% of enemy hero base damage and grants it to you as base damage for the debuff duration.

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml:

  • Level 15 Talent changed from Gale Hero Impact Summons 2 Wards to +100 Attack Range
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Venomous Gale
      • Causes Venomous Gale to summon twoPlague Wardwhen it impacts an enemy hero. Increases travel distance by 400.

label: Viper
descriptionHtml:
• Nethertoxinmanacost rescaled from 70/80/90/100 to 85
  • Level 25 Talent changed from Nethertoxin Silences to -11s Nethertoxin Cooldown
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesPoison Attack
      • Poison Attacks now also lower armor by 1.5 per stack. Increases max stacks by 2.

label: Visage

  • Summon Familiarsbase attack time increased from 0.4 to 0.5
  • Summon Familiars damage increased from 20/40/60 to 25/50/75
  • Reworked Aghanim's Scepter
    • GrantsSilent as the Grave
      • Turns you and familiars invisible and +20% movement speed, as well as upgrading your movement type to flying.
      • When you or your familiars exit invisibility, you deal 30% bonus damage for 4 seconds.
      • Lasts 35 seconds. Cooldown: 45. Manacost: 100
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesGravekeeper's Cloak
      • Allows you to cast Gravekeeper's Cloak to turn into Stone Form.
      • Restores up to 25% of your health. Cooldown: 60. Manacost: 300.

label: Void Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Level 20 Talent reduced from -5.5Astral StepCharge Restore Time to -5
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesDissimilate
      • Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by 125.

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:
• Level 20 Talent increased from +300Shadow WordAoE to +500
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Shadow Word
      • Shadow Word now provides +20/-20% movement speed on allies/enemies.

label: Weaver
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesThe Swarm
      • Causes The Swarm to latch onto and reveal invisible units.
      • CausesGeminate Attackto also launch an extra attack onto other enemies within 1200 range of the attack target that have Beetles attached to them.
      • Reduces The Swarm cooldown by 4 seconds.

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml:
• Windrunscepter movement speed reduced from 45% to 40%
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesPowershot
      • Powershot now becomes global, but after reaching its default range, it only affects heroes (max 1 hero).
      • Impacted heroes will be killed if they are under 13% health after taking the impact damage.
      • Kill threshold scales based on powershot channel duration.

label: Winter Wyvern
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 2
  • Cold Embracebase heal per second increased from 20/26/32/38 to 30/35/40/45
  • Arctic Burnscepter mana cost reduced from 30 to 20
  • Arctic Burn scepter upgrade also increases your movement speed by 25%
  • Level 25 Talent increased from +1.2sWinter's CurseDuration to +1.5
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Cold Embrace
      • When Cold Embrace ends, aSplinter Blastgoes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1200 range.

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Shard
    • GrantsVoodoo Switcheroo
      • Turns you into aDeath Wardfor 2 seconds.
      • Death Ward has -30 Attack Speed.
      • You are hidden/invulnerable during this time. Cooldown: 70. Manacost: 250.

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedMortal Strike. It is now a passive cooldown critical strike ability. Crit: 150/190/230/270%. Cooldown: 4
  • Reworked Vampiric Aura. Now calledVampiric Spirit. Provides you with 10/18/26/34% Lifesteal. Can be activated to summon skeletons (same numbers as when it was on Mortal Strike). Skeletons also have the Vampiric Spirit ability.
  • Scepter upgrade now buffs Wraith units with +75 Attack Speed and +25% Movement Speed
  • Level 20 Talent changed from NoReincarnationMana Cost to +30 Movement Speed
  • Level 25 Talent changed from +20% Vampiric Aura to -2s Mortal Strike Cooldown
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • Upgrades Reincarnation
      • Causes Reincarnation to not have a mana cost and spawns three skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.

label: Zeus
descriptionHtml:
• Thundergod's Wrathmanacost increased from 250/350/450 to 300/400/500
  • Thundergod's Wrath cooldown increased from 120 to 130/125/120
  • Level 10 Talent reduced from +1.5 Mana Regen to 1.25
  • Level 20 Talent changed from +12% Cooldown Reduction to +100 Thundergod's Wrath Damage
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from +115Arc LightningDamage to +100
  • Added Aghanim's Shard
    • UpgradesStatic Field
      • Static Field can be cast to perform a Heavenly Jump, shocking the closest visible enemy (hero priority) within 2000 range, dealing Static Field damage to them and reducing their movement speed by 100% for 2.5 seconds.
      • If you were moving forward, you will jump towards that direction 450 distance. Cooldown: 14. Manacost: 100.
